description:
Gemini gets certain of his victory, beating Seiya and his 5 senses. At the same time, Mu of Aries helps Shaka of Virgo and Phoenix Ikki from another dimension. Shaka repaired Ikki’s Phoenix Cloth.  On the other hand, losing 5senses, Seiya still continues to fight against the Gold Saint of Gemini, Saga. Suddenly, the Justice Face on the mask of Gold Cloth of Gemini sheds tears. Ikki comes into the Pope’s room and lets Seiya go to the Athena’s Shrine. Defeating Ikki, Saga of Gemini follows Seiya. In the Athena’s Shrine, Seiya finds the Sheild of the Athena Statue, and hold it up over his head, The battle in Sanctuary is about to end after making a lot of sacrifices. Seiya tries his last effort to save Athena, but the Gold Saint of Gemini, the reincarnation of evil, attacks him. Finally the last fire on the tower has gone and Athena is about to die……
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go, Seiya! Forget all the sorrow
Ike Seiya! Tomo no Shi o Koete
¡Vamos Seiya! Supera la muerte de tus amigos
行け星矢! 友の死をこえて
